name: Rise Of The Dead Ones
description:
Hey!

This is a metroidvania  game demo, developed in Unity 2D for developer portfolio. It is aesthetically based in Castlevania gothic style, using pixel art. 

You have to collect ítems to pass among game zones and the main objetive is defeat the boss and you have all the information about the game narrative at the first . All you need to know are de controllers.

Enjoy!

Controller:

  • A D to move forward and back
  • Cntrl to attack
  • Space bar to jump
  • Left click for UI buttons
